General./start: Send for you simple welcome text.
General./help: Send help information about all commands for your user-type

Guest./registrate: Set user status as User if user status is Guest or None
Guest./reg [login] [password]: Set user status as AdminUser and this status must confirmed SuperAdmin.

User./find [name]: Find book by name from database
User./id [id]: Find book by id from database

Admin./add [file]: Save file if its mimetype is one of FB2 PDF EPUB, MOBI, TXT, LaTeX
Admin./del [id]: Delete book by id from database

SuperAdmin./confirmation [user_id]: Confirmation of user status as Admin by id as user_id
